name: Train Journey (itch)
description:
Train Journey is a game about piecing together the narrative of a family's journey by train.  Use the clues in each scene to try to determine what chapter they belong in and what order they go in.

Developer: Rain Frogs

Engine: Unity

Gameplay: 20 minutes.

Art sourced from: https://www.flickr.com/photos/britishlibrary/

Sound Effects from: https://freesound.org/

Music: https://soundcloud.com/cis-minor/bassoon-over-bourbon-street

All assets used except Bassoon Over Bourbon Street are in public domain.
